input: Without doing the arithmetic yourself, issue a single tool call that asks the calculator to evaluate 141-980.
Prepare a tool call for the calculator so that it can evaluate 488*363. Do not simplify the expression by hand.
Prepare a tool call for the calculator so that it can evaluate 553+487. Do not simplify the expression by hand.
Instead of computing the answer, construct a calculator invocation that will evaluate 953+789 when executed.
Use the calculator tool (not mental math) to obtain the value of 985-467. Respond with a <tool_call>.
Imagine you are building a pipeline: your job is to generate the <tool_call> that tells the calculator to compute 457*796.
